thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Whirlwind weeken
thread.title_full: Whirlwind weeken - Review of BEST WESTERN PLUS El Rancho Inn, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: 991heidin
title: Whirlwind weeken
text: My husband and I needed a place to stay for an out of town family function. The location was perfect, close to the airport. Shuttle service to and from airport was excellent. Amenities were excellent. Staff was very friendly and helpful, since we were not from the area. I would highly recommend this facility and we look forward to staying again in the future.
